author: Travis Simpson (noreply@couriernews.com)
title: Hector wins on Senior Night
text: slideshow HECTOR â€” The Wildcats picked up a 47-14 Senior Night victory over the Union Christian Eagles on Friday at Linton Field.Hector (7-0, 5-0 2A-4 Conference) extended its undefeated 2A-4 Conference streak by another game and head coach Mark Taylor got to give all his seniors some time on the field."They all got to have their moment," he said. "We came out a little flat, but we still took care of business."Jacob Billingsley drew first blood from nine yards out to go up 7-0 after the PAT. Tanner Gaines took his turn on a 79-yard run to make it 13-0. Gaines then connected with Braxton Hendrix and again with Jalen Ferguson to make it 27-0.A 44-yard pass to Jaden Graham made it 40-0 at the half. James Sims scored on a 27-yard run to make it 47-0. Union Christian added two touchdowns in the fourth quarter.Hector travels to Decatur on Friday.
